name: pnp-sp-fx-aces-ace-londonservices
title: Status of London Transport Services
shortDescription: Adaptive Card displays of London Train services and status
longDescription: ACE with multiple card and quick views to display the status of London Train services and allows the user to mark a train line as their favourite with that data using Microsoft Graph.

references.name: Viva Connections Extensibility guidance
references.description: Adaptive Card Extensions are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page.
